solution_line_template: 5 minutes for picking up toys, 20 minutes to vacuum, 15 minutes on windows and 10 minutes on furniture is {pickup_toys_minutes}+{vacuum_minutes}+{windows_minutes}+{dusting_minutes} = <<{pickup_toys_minutes}+{vacuum_minutes}+{windows_minutes}+{dusting_minutes}={total_minutes_per_week}>>{total_minutes_per_week} minutes

After {num_weeks} weeks, she has spent {num_weeks} weeks * {total_minutes_per_week} minutes/week = <<{num_weeks}*{total_minutes_per_week}={total_cleaning_time}>>{total_cleaning_time} minutes cleaning the living room
